timevareff_editor.js

fetchFeatureProfiles()

retrieves timevareff profiles

Returns:

Promise to make sure functions during setup are called in order

fillSelectedFeatureTimevareffEditor(target)

TODO: generalize this function probably when the user selects an element in the ui in the timevareff tab, this function sets all checkboxes for that element to the right value

Arguments:

  • target (event_target_object) – html object whose onchange event triggered the function call

check_uncheck_timevareff(checkbox, demand_type, key, demandIndex)

TODO: generalize function or at least rename it (needs to generalize select Id and FeatureObject) removes or adds a graph to the demand chart and marks whether the checkbox is set in the DemandObject

Arguments:

  • checkbox (HTML_element) – checkbox html element whose onchange event triggered the function calls

  • demand_type (string) – which demand category the checkbox belongs to

  • key (int) – the index of the checkbox in the list

  • demandIndex (int) – the index of the demand category

populatTimevareffEditor(data, name, index)

TODO: Generalize this function generates html elements for the checkboxes

Arguments:

  • data (list) – list containing all possible time series of a profile, could be swapped out with just length value tbh

  • name (string) – key for getting the correct html div element and setting the checkbox onclick function

  • index (int) – secondary key for setting the checkbox onclick function
